name.description: Specifies the name of the Application Insights component. Changing this forces a

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

application_type.description: Specifies the type of Application Insights to create. Valid values are `ios` for _iOS_, `java` for _Java web_, `MobileCenter` for _App Center_, `Node.JS` for _Node.js_, `other` for _General_, `phone` for _Windows Phone_, `store` for _Windows Store_ and `web` for _ASP.NET_. Please note these values are case sensitive; unmatched values are treated as _ASP.NET_ by Azure. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

daily_data_cap_in_gb.description: Specifies the Application Insights component daily data volume cap in GB.

daily_data_cap_notifications_disabled.description: Specifies if a notification email will be send when the daily data volume cap is met.

retention_in_days.description: Specifies the retention period in days. Possible values are `30`, `60`, `90`, `120`, `180`, `270`, `365`, `550` or `730`.

sampling_percentage.description: Specifies the percentage of the data produced by the monitored application that is sampled for Application Insights telemetry.

disable_ip_masking.description: By default the real client ip is masked as `0.0.0.0` in the logs. Use this argument to disable masking and log the real client ip. Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Application Insights component.

app_id.description: The App ID associated with this Application Insights component.

instrumentation_key.description: The Instrumentation Key for this Application Insights component.

create.description: Used when creating the Application Insights Component.

update.description: Used when updating the Application Insights Component.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Application Insights Component.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Application Insights Component.
